name: Hagraven
location: Forsworn camps, ancient ritual sites, wilderness

aspects.trouble: Obsessed with Dark Bargains and Forbidden Magic
other_aspects: Master of Curses and Dark Rituals
Collector of Eyes and Body Parts

stunts: Hex Magic: Can curse targets with Lore, creating lasting negative aspects like 'Withering Curse' or 'Eyes of Terror' (lasts entire scene)
Command Forsworn: Forsworn in her presence gain +1 to all rolls due to fanatical devotion and fear
Talons and Beak: In melee, can use Fight with +2 and attacks may cause 'Bleeding' aspect
Dark Pact: Once per session, offer a dark bargain to a player character (power in exchange for something precious). If accepted, both parties are bound by fate
Ritual Site Power: When fighting at her ritual site, gain +2 to all Lore rolls and can summon spectral allies
notes: Hagravens are witches who have transformed themselves into monstrous bird-like creatures through dark magic. They serve as matriarchs of Forsworn tribes and conduct terrible rituals. They collect body parts for their magic and make dark pacts with those desperate enough to seek them out. Extremely dangerous both magically and in melee combat.
combat_tactics: Hagravens prefer to let Forsworn warriors engage enemies while they cast destructive magic and curses from the rear. They use hexes to weaken strong enemies and empower their allies. If cornered, they fight viciously with talons and beak. They may offer bargains to strong enemies they cannot defeat, preferring to corrupt rather than be destroyed.
loot: Collection of eyes and body parts
